summary: Adds a shield from TV Series Vikings.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][img]http://uploadffs.nl/images/2015/01/03/ScreenShot16410f5b.jpg[/img]ROLLO'S SHIELD[/size][/center]
[u]NOTE:
[/u]The mod is updated. You will get the dirtier version like on the first picture.

[u]DESCRIPTION:[/u]
Adds Rollo's shield from TV Show Vikings.

[u]INSTALLATION:[/u]
Extract the file and copy the folder "Data" to your Skyrim directory or simply install with Nexus Mod Manager.

[u]UNINSTALLATION:[/u]
Delete the files that you extracted from your Skyrim installation directory or deactivate and remove the mod with Nexus Mod Manager.

[u]IN-GAME:[/u]
The shield can be crafted at a blacksmith's forge with the following components:
1 × Leather Strips
4 × Iron Ingot
[b]
[/b][u]STATS:[/u]
Class: Light Armor, Shield
Weight: 3
Base Armor: 30
Base Value: 500

[u]PERMISSIONS:[/u]
You may not modify or re-upload this mod anywhere without my permission.

[u]KNOWN CONFLICTS AND BUGS:[/u]
None. However if you seem to find any, message me or post it in the comments.

[u]VIKINGS SHIELDS:[/u]
Ragnar's Shield - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61076/?
Lagertha's Shield - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61103/?
Rollo's Shield: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61313/?
More soon...


[center]by Rakul[/center]
author: Rakul
